content:
now that we're showing availability icons on the left sidebar, we need to figure out an icon for bots. Some options

  • Always show as green
  • Show nothing
  • Create a special availability icon for bots

Currently, we show bots as unavailable. It's not a big problem, but bringing it up since a user's first interaction on zulip is with welcome-bot.
I think showing some icon for the bot in that context is probably the right model (e.g. Slack just has a heart for Slackbot's presence, and that fits in)
I would probably go with our existing bot icon that we show next to names in the message feed, sized appropriately, and see if that looks good.
